page.title: 13Games Children Play
page.content: The games children play at school in the playground are games like football, cricket, it and others like races and hopscotch. The games children like to play at home are computer games,snakes and ladders, ludo, buccaneer, formula one,hangman, colditz, cluedo, monopoly, operation and haunted house. The electronic games children play are called astro wars, pacman, Mickey and Donald and fire attack. The games children play at sports centres and recreation grounds are tennis, swimming, cricket, badminton and squash. The rules of monopoly are that you have to go round the board buying and selling roads and streets. In colditz you have to escape from a prisoner of war camp.
